website_summaries.verdict: With a 20-cm 300-ppi display, this is one of the best-looking eReaders available. A great option for those with vision troubles.
pros: Sports one of the largest eReader displays
A great choice for anyone who reads comics or struggles with small text
16GB of storage, expandable with the convenient SD card slot
cons: Can freezing up or grow sluggish over time
Tends to search for WiFi signal even when connected to a network, draining battery

customer_reviews.title: Works Well for Me
customer_reviews.text: After installing the App Greenify, the battery life is great. I am running the Google setup on this. Can't get the Google Calendar to work, but all else does. Using Kobo, Libby, Kindle, Pocket, Workflowy, IHeartRadio, Keep, Bring, Audible. I can play Audible books and more through the Bluetooth on my car radio. Works with Bluetooth keyboard. For me, it is mostly an e-reader, but the other options are rather handy, especially the car audio options. Today I listened to several stories on Pocket using the text to speech feature on Pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Lowe

customer_reviews.title: A good e-reader but nothing more
customer_reviews.text: It's a reader,like a Kindle but with finger-sensitive screen, nothing more. After several exchanges with the seller, thinking mine was defective, it turns out that I misinterpreted the description. This is a reader for e-books (multiple formats), it is a bit sluggish (45 secondes to wake from sleep), and although it includes a web browser and other paraphernalia, it's functionality for those other apps/software is VERY limited and no less buggy. As an e-reader it is OK (not as good as Kindle and not waterproof); as anything more, it is rather useless. The wonderful hand sketches that appear on the screen are very misleading since this unit CANNOT WORK WITH A STYLUS of any kind.
customer_reviews.author: AlchemistOfLife

customer_reviews.title: Buy This One.  Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: Per other reviews, the unit ships with Chinese as the default language. Look for the little button to change the language and the worst thing about the tablet is fixed. This is 100% an android tablet with an e-ink display. I have spotify streaming audio over bluetooth, gmail, Libby for reading library books. It's all here. The only other nitpick is the speed of the keypress is a bit fast. That means if you hold a key down long enough, it displays the other character the key supports, not the one you wanted. It took me a minute to figure it out. Just type quickly and it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Cluster Node

customer_reviews.title: Lighting is not uniform on bottom screen and experiences lightbleed
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this ereader and even exchanged it for a replacement because I thought mine was defective. There is some lightbleed or uneven lighting at the bottom of the screen, for both the original and replacement device I received. Overall the product itself is solid and works great as an android eReader for the price. Software and hardware specs are great. But they send you a little certificate of QC only to have issues on the original and replacement device. Maybe I'll try the Likebook Ares or Onyx Boox instead - a lot of users mention
customer_reviews.author: Boni

customer_reviews.title: Awesome eReader.
customer_reviews.text: It's having both day and warm light i.e. candle light. The greatest advantage are the apps i.e. both kindle and playbook are available in one package. It's slim and easy to hold. The battery life is sufficiently ok. So easy to navigate through different things. The screen is crisp and design is great. Good buy for a seasoned reader.
customer_reviews.author: Mundiz

customer_reviews.title: Busy little fella
customer_reviews.text: It aggressively tries to connect to whatever wireless network that is in range, even if you have WiFi turned off, even at the cost of draining the battery.
customer_reviews.author: S3RIOUS

customer_reviews.title: It works and it’s simple
customer_reviews.text: It has customization options, wifi, bluetooth, and is so far doing everything I wanted it to do. I even downloaded YouTube to see if/how that would work. Guess what! It doesn’t! And honestly that’s good it’s an optimized tablet for reading just about anything. I read that the screen is ideal for reading kana as well and that’s true too for whenever I get back into my language studies.
customer_reviews.author: Thay

customer_reviews.title: screen broke easily
customer_reviews.text: I was really enjoying this E-reader but I have it less then a month and the screen broke. I didn't even use it everyday. I was looming for an E-reader that I could easily use with both Google Play books and Kindle app and the Likebook Mars came up multiple times as a good choice. However the fact that the screen broke so easily means it was very well built. I returned the product to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Helen L.

customer_reviews.title: Great value, a few very small quirks.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, technically I think it isn't supported by Overdrive which is what I bought it for, but it works almost flawlessly anyway. Every fourth or fifth book it freezes up for a few seconds, but other than that it has been perfect. The backlight control app lets you tweak the lighting just right for reading in any conditions. WiFi is pretty easy to set up and use. I have not yet tried adding an SD card or using a USB connection. I'm pretty much just downloading straight from the Internet over wifi.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron McHugh

customer_reviews.title: Second one to die, this one lasted two or three weeks
customer_reviews.text: It is frozen, and although I got insurance I am returning it. Absurd. TWO HAVE died in this case in weeks, the other lasted about six months. No help unfreezing, nothing showing when I attach it to my computer. I bought one in Dec. 2018, the fragile screen broke (it wasn't dropped) and Likebook said too bad. Fragile screen is your problem. If they work, they're great. But come on 2 weeks (and I literally kept it in the orginal shipping box wrapped in bubble pack@#$$$$%^&*()_) and a couple of days and it's totally dead. AVOID IT.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Excellent E-Reader, Responsive & Capable
customer_reviews.text: I have owned Kindles for years and last year an Onyx Boox Note, however this thing is snappy and responsive. It runs Android as though it is a tablet and its screen is a joy to read in the evenings with its warm candlelight.
customer_reviews.author: unfrozen jon

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Reliability Issues
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a few e-readers and never seen reliability this bad. I used it once, and it worked fine. Forgot about it for a a month, recharged it, and now it's stuck at boot. So literally the second time I've used it and it's bricked. The reset button does nothing. I'm now stuck searching for any way to salvage it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan E.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to be a good e-ink reader, but unfortunately, didn't work for what I wanted to use it for. I was informed that this was Android based and could run Android apps which was what I wanted. I am in a band and wanted this for lyrics (indoor/outdoor use). After some figuring, I got the app to load that I use but it wouldn't function properly. But, the screen was clear and the unit ran pretty well otherwise. Would def use as an e-ink reader
customer_reviews.author: RoxFan

customer_reviews.title: love this ereader
customer_reviews.text: So far I am very happy with this reader. Its fairly light, has extremely long battery life and the screen is very readable. It does take a bit to learn how to use it properly but not that much. The back light works very well so is readable without waking my wife up. :-) Its also fairly easy to load books on and the touch screen works well. For the money, its the best deal out there.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great as a gift.
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked how beautiful the screen was. It's quick and responsive. I was able to get Google play on it very easily. I purchased this as a Christmas gift for my sister who doesn't like reading on bright screens and she thinks it's great.
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Buggy little thing
customer_reviews.text: Seems like it's very cheaply made. Touch screen is super unresponsive. Sometimes when I try to open it, it gets stuck in "startup mode". The only way to start it is to plug it in... Even when it has more than 60% battery. And just today it suddenly reverted to Chinese language for no apparent reason. It's OK for reading books when it works but it is very buggy. I'll keep this one, but would advise anyone against paying full price for one.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron R Smith

customer_reviews.title: Kindle app not working properly
customer_reviews.text: I had downloaded a ebook from Amazon using the Kindle app on a tablet. I had not finished it. I was able to read it with both the tablet and this LikeBook. When downloading another ebook from Amazon, using that tablet, I could read it there but it didn't show as available on this LikeBook. Has anyone else had that issue? Othewise I like this device. But now anxious to get the problem resolved.
customer_reviews.author: R. Nowack

customer_reviews.title: It's so slow . It doesn’t work, I doesn't open.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t work after 3 months later. I bought for reading pdf. I charhed in the beginning then I could used. I was so busy in December so I didn't use. In January I came to Turkey and I wanted to use unfortunately I couldn't open. It always gives error no battery even It is on charge. Anyway I paid 229 $ for nothing. I don't know what to do. So my clearly advise PLEASE STAY AWAY Likebook Mars E-Reader.
customer_reviews.author: Tuğba

customer_reviews.title: Great kindle upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Have the kindle paperwhite but it's way to small for pdfs for school. Likebook is almost perfect for pdfs, but if it was a but bigger would be great. Overall I would recommend for school textbook and make sure to use the crop feature to help the book fix better in the screen. Also the fact it can download dropbox and other apps I use for school is great.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo

customer_reviews.title: Great Battery life
customer_reviews.text: Love battery life. Thought it might be too heavy being larger than kindle but the balance is right so doesn't feel heavy. Great clear text. I use Koreader as didn't like any of the others. I love this unit
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fine for the first few weeks...
customer_reviews.text: I liked it at first. Purchased back in the fall of 2019. Loaded a 512 GB micro SD card and the offline version of Wikipedia. About 2 weeks of standby on battery... Not a speed demon but everything worked. Today I get a device which was constantly rebooting and now fails to load Android. BTW, I don't believe the 'reset' button is tied to anything. Now the device is bricked.
customer_reviews.author: Hue Bell

customer_reviews.title: Total garbage only expensive
customer_reviews.text: I spent about two hours reviewing e-readers before deciding on a likebook. I was immediately sold from a comprehensive YouTube review of all the functions and the slightly bigger screen size. However, once I received it and went to set it up the touchscreen only worked sometimes - not even enough to put in my password for WiFi and it was hot to the touch. Obviously, it has some internal issues, and that’s there quality control for one of the most expensive e-readers on the market? It was a huge waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A Middleton

customer_reviews.title: Nice e-reader, good for connecting to local libs
customer_reviews.text: Nice e-reader, with the play store I can download local library apps like the CloudLibrary and Hoopla and use them to read. Great battery life. Only downside is when Android updates it switches back to the default Chinese language.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Stay away if you have a Mac OS device...
customer_reviews.text: It is a good looking E-reader with a large screen, feels great in the hand, it is better than Kindle BUT, when using the supplied cable I couldn't sync with my Mac OS device (MacBook Pro) and the WIFI and Bluetooth connections were also not working! So be ready to be frustrated if you are using this reader with a mac os device. (RETURNED)
customer_reviews.author: Alessandro Di Lolli

customer_reviews.title: Excellent eReader and highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great product matched with great customer service! The e-reader arrived on time. At first, I had problems downloading google play but was quickly assisted by customer service. This is my first e-reader, and I selected this because of the size, texture (rubber coating like a thinkpad), expandable memory, blue-tooth, and earphone jack to play my mp3's. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a practical e-reader meant for reading with all the add on's you will not find in popular brands.
customer_reviews.author: GGG

customer_reviews.title: great value for money
customer_reviews.text: overall a very good device. clear interface ,android system. embedded reader is very easy to use and have sever options that make it a nice reading even with PDF files. cons: touch screen a bit laggy sometimes and somethings the press is not received. swipe motion are not very sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: eduard elishayev

customer_reviews.title: Ok product but i would get Onyx
customer_reviews.text: This one has soso software. I had to jump around the hoop to get the google play store. Screen is pretty small. It also doesn’t refresh well. I like onyx better
customer_reviews.author: S. L.

customer_reviews.title: With the Andriod app, your e-reader is capable of reading any file format.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best e-reader on the market. The native reading app, lets you copy paste pdf documents easier than the installed Acrobat program. This is the perfect solution for all the e-book fans.
customer_reviews.author: Andy W

customer_reviews.title: Immediately Broken Touch Screen
customer_reviews.text: A day out of the box, the touch screen immediately began glitching. Pressing on icons would be randomly unresponsive, preventing me from even opening the settings menu! The next day, the screen started randomly clicking everywhere, which isn't exactly great where you're trying to read. Don't waste your time or money on this product. 0/10
customer_reviews.author: Andrew G

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this ereader
customer_reviews.text: Not Amazon's fault but this ereader is garbage, I have had it for less than 90 days, it locked up, stucck on the startup screen, no way to reset it, no support from the company, big waste of over $200,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 2 months of use
customer_reviews.text: After two months of use, the device died. I can't turn it on and the device is completely non-responsive. I sent an inquiry message to Mica Mica Produced about a week ago but didn't get any response yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to discover the existence of e-ink devices that run android. I chose this one based on price, size, and what I had heard from other owners. I use it for the LOGOS Bible app, and reading e-books. There is the occasional lag in responding to a touch, but never a failure to work. It is easy to read from, even without the built in lights.
customer_reviews.author: B Neumann

customer_reviews.title: Good eBook reader which can add any book readers like pocket book and Ridibooks
customer_reviews.text: When I opened this reader, I couldn't find the google play to open other apps. But just I connected a USB cable between the reader and my PC, then this one showed the folders. I downloaded apk files from the website. It works. Fast and clear to see everything.
customer_reviews.author: SKoh

customer_reviews.title: Poor software quality
customer_reviews.text: The software quality is very raw. The product itself is good but without good software it is not worth the price you pay
customer_reviews.author: Anton

customer_reviews.title: bought2 items , both of them stopped working after a view days
customer_reviews.text: bought 2 items , one of them failed to charge at all and eventually stopped working the second got hot after charge and then refused to turn on forever sadly had to return them....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great andriod ereader
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ereader I got this tablet to use with logos bible software. It works well with this program. I rate this 4 out of 5 stars since the andriod upgrade bumps you back to Chinese language as default. You can find videos to address this issue but it was a challenge. You will also need to install google play store manually. This worked without a hitch. I also highly recommend the 128 GB Micro SD expansion card and case.
customer_reviews.author: Robert T Christenson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Good battery life. Works great with Android apps (Scribd works!!!)
customer_reviews.author: ki

customer_reviews.title: This doesn't work properly
customer_reviews.text: after a couple of days, the problems starts. Even after I go to next page, I still can see previous page at same time. Rebooting and refreshing works for a couple of pages and it kept happening. I do not recommend this one and I will return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: affordable e-ink reader
customer_reviews.text: pros: 1.bigger screen than kindle 2.faster CPU with 2g memory 3.Android 6.0 with Play store 4.SD slot 5. A2 mode 6.buletooth 7.3.5 headphone jack cons: 1.poor interface 2.short battery life (1~2 days) 3.warm and cold backlit cannot coexist 4.cold backlit is nothing near white but very blueish
customer_reviews.author: Eric Wang

customer_reviews.title: During initial setup - Set your language as default!
customer_reviews.text: I live in Florida and read a lot. NOOK And Kindle e-ink devices are little small. Likebook is small enough to carry and big enough to read full size pages. Because it is Android there are many Apps. Very much worth the effort to learn the options.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Device
customer_reviews.text: I've found this ereader to be very responsive and I appreciate the two different backlight colors. I also like that I can download other reading apps from the Play Store, but the default reading app works well too. Plenty of storage for books and the memory is expandable, which is a must for me
customer_reviews.author: Chris Grant

customer_reviews.title: Support is very important
customer_reviews.text: The reader is not very friendly, the user guide is very poor. The respond time is quite slow. On the other hand, I had problem with the reader and the support tried very hard to help me. I had to return the reader and I just got a new one. Hope this time thing will go better
customer_reviews.author: maimong

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great I love it and use it a lot every where it looks like paper and is very light weight
customer_reviews.author: Dari D.

customer_reviews.title: Great eReader
customer_reviews.text: First time I use this device. Started to use since December 2019 and finally I can read books from my google books, kindle and calibre in one device. My dreams came true!!!.
customer_reviews.author: acahuana

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy & waste you're money. will stop working in 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in Nov 2019 and it worked fine for a couple of months. Now it is stuck in recovery mode and would not start normally. Its been like this for 2 months. I tried everything and nothing seems to work. Don't waste you're money!
customer_reviews.author: Walid Al-Moualem

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for me.
customer_reviews.text: Was only looking for a 7'8" reader. Don't really care about using it as a tablet. Happy so far with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Wallace Galloway

customer_reviews.title: Fast, stable and versatile e-book reader.
customer_reviews.text: This 7.8 inch e-book reader is what I was looking for. It is fast and versatile to use. It has upgraded the environment of reading books . Besides, I am so happy that I can use remote controller for flipping pages. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kwon, Min

customer_reviews.title: Scratch on the display.
customer_reviews.text: Would have given 5 stars if the display scratch is not there.. a brand new device with a display scratch... bad.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: works well for various reading apps
customer_reviews.text: Device works great, the built in reading app is fast, and android apps run smooth too. Power button seems just a little loose, and touch screen takes a little time to get used to. But overall, the reading is nice and I prefer it to previous ereaders I've owned!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Don't upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: They just updated and the reader won't sort books and there are no functioning accessiblity features to compensate their other changes.
customer_reviews.author: tIM

customer_reviews.title: didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Didn't really get a chance to use it. When I tried Audible I got a message that it needed to be updated and when I tried to do that nothing worked. Too many other choices out there to waste time on trying to figure it out. returned
customer_reviews.author: S C

customer_reviews.title: Not Satisfied overall.
customer_reviews.text: battery life is less than kindle.Built in Dictionery is in Chinese.
customer_reviews.author: Zaheer Abbas

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 6months, emailing support gives no response....
customer_reviews.text: Broke in less than half a year, I didn't drop it or anything... Even has a case on.
customer_reviews.author: ez bz

customer_reviews.title: good for reading book
customer_reviews.text: i bought this eReader for books and browsing web. Reading books are excellent, but browsing web is a bit hard since it doesn't refresh the screen faster enough, but the cpu speed is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: It's good e-book reader.
customer_reviews.text: I think it's maybe best e-book reader in this price.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Kim

customer_reviews.title: Just amazing
customer_reviews.text: The best thing is that runs android, its fast and you can install a lot of things
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quite Convenient
customer_reviews.text: The product is quite convenient,I can read all the ebook from library without upload from computer as I did in kindle
customer_reviews.author: DAI LU

customer_reviews.title: a great android e-ink reader
customer_reviews.text: great product. the only drawback is it takes almost 30 seconds every time to launch.
customer_reviews.author: Wei J.

customer_reviews.title: Used
customer_reviews.text: Received a box with black finger prints all over the yellow box and a hair inside. Buyers beware.
customer_reviews.author: KMaw

product_meta.title: Likebook Mars E-Reader, 7.8' Carta Touch Screen,300PPI, 8Core Processor，Adjustable Built-in Warm/Cold Light, Built-in Audible, Support Google Play Store, Android 6.0(Support to update to Android 8.1),
product_meta.description:
Product Description : 
How to Upgrade to Android 8.1 
Please watch the video instruction on Youtube；https://youtu.be/zTNIV5m2ODw 
How to active Google service 
Please go to user settings-app settings-tools(top right)-enable google framework, the device will reboot and the google play is activated 
How to transfer files from Mac OS to Likebook Mars 
You need to install androidfiletransfer.dmg on your Mac Devices in advance then Reader can be recognized by Mac system 
How to Install Dictionary 
Likebook Mars support StarDict Dictionary, Set up a folded named: Dict in the root of the Likebook Mars , and Copy the dictionary (StarDict) Inside, Reboot this device 
How to Install New Fonts 
Set up a folder named: Fonts in the root of the Likebook Mars , and Copy the New Fonts Inside, Reboot this device 
1. 7.8" E-ink Touchscreen: 1872*1404 HD display. Use special anti-glare technology, effectively reduce the reflective light and protect the screen. 
2. High-speed Octa-core Processor: RK3368 8Core Processor, faster response, more stable performance. 
3. Adjustable Built-in Front-light: Warm &cold light switching. Protect your eyes and enables you to read day and night. 
4. Convenient PDF Reading: Functions of adjusting grey-scale, edge cutting, re-layout, rotating direction would bring much convenience to you. 
5. Voice Reading Function: You can listen to audiobook and music. Just enjoy the endless fun! 
Mica House Likebook Mars Unbox video 
https://youtu.be/0Sc0Ncfxvso 
How to install Google play store on Likebook Mars 
https://youtu.be/vrNPB--t2gA 
Contact with info@sz-mica.com for any after service issue
feature_bullets: 📘1. Enable Google Play - Click User Settings -> Apps -> tools(top right)-enable google framework; Video : https://youtu.be/mz2ZU2yhISc。Likebook Mars support finger touch, do not support Stylus, pen writting function .

📘2. 7.8"E-ink HD Touchscreen: 1404*1872 300PPI Super high resolution, 9.3mm thickness enable light and thin comfortable touch feeling; special anti-glare Technology effectively reduce the reflective light and protect the screen.

📘3. Android 6.0 System: RK3368 8Core 1.5GHz processor, Faster response, Smoother turn page, Lower power consumption; 2G+16G Storage space, Support Bluetooth ,WIFI Data transfer。If you want to upgrade to Android,8.1, please watch the video instruction on Youtube；https://youtu.be/zTNIV5m2ODw
📘4. Dual Mode Color Temperature Front-light: 24 Grades cold and warm light adjustment Step-less adjustable. Protect your eyes and enable you to read day and night.

📘5. Multiple Formats For All Your Need : Support multiple mainstream formats in market Excellent PDF reading experience , Automatic edge cutting adjusting grey-scale, re-layout, rotating direction would bring much convenience to you. A2 refreshing to improve your setting performance

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars300 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
